author: KalingaTV Bureau
title: TN: Rain causes severe waterlogging in Trichy, Thoothukudi regions; IMD predicts heavy rainfall in multiple districts
text:
Chennai : The India Meteorological Department (IMD) on Friday issued a warning for Tamil Nadu, forecasting heavy rainfall across multiple districts until December 14.
Severe waterlogging was reported in Trichy following incessant rain, while Thoothukudi and other districts experienced moderate to heavy rainfall.
The IMD predicts moderate thunderstorms with heavy rain in districts like Ariyalur, and Perambalur. Thiruchirapalli, Karur, Dindigul, Mayiladuthurai, Nagapattinam, Thanjavur, Thiruvarur, Tenkasi, Theni, Virudhunagar, Pudukkottai Ramanathapuram and Sivaganga districts of Tamilnadu and Karaikal area.
The resultant weather conditions could lead to water logging and the traffic may be affected in some areas.
Light Thunderstorms & lightning with Light to Moderate rain are very likely at one or two places over Cuddalore, Salem, Namakkal, Nilgiris, and Coimbatore. Tiruppur, Tirunelveli and Thoothukkudi districts of Tamilnadu. The Thiruvallur and Chengalpattu districts of Tamilnadu will receive light rain.
Tamil Nadu’s weather forecast predicted a maximum temperature of 28-29°C, and a minimum temperature of 24-25°C, with partly cloudy skies and a chance of light to moderate rain within the next 24 hours in several districts.
Meanwhile, IMD has also predicted heavy to very heavy rainfall likely at isolated places over other southern parts of India, mainly in Karaikal, Lakshadweep, and Andaman and Nicobar Islands.
According to IMD, the well-marked low-pressure area that was previously located over the Gulf of Mannar and nearby regions has now shifted to a low-pressure zone over the Gulf of Mannar and the adjacent Comorin area.
As per the update, the system’s upper air cyclonic circulation extends up to mid-tropospheric levels. It is expected to move westward towards the Maldives and the nearby Lakshadweep area, crossing the Comorin region. The system is anticipated to weaken gradually over the next 24 hours, with a diminishing impact on the surrounding areas.
(ANI)
Also Read: Bengaluru techie Atul Subhash’s in-laws flee home amid arrest fears over his suicide

author: Estadão Conteúdo
title: Brasileira de 16 anos natural de SC morre em bombardeio no Líbano, diz tio - Bem Paraná
text: Uma brasileira de 16 anos, natural de Balneário Camboriú (SC), morreu em um bombardeio no Líbano na segunda-feira, 23, disseram familiares ao Estadão nesta quinta-feira, 26. O caso, ainda não confirmado pelo Ministério das Relações Exteriores (MRE), seria a segunda morte de um brasileiro em território libanês desde a escalada de bombardeios entre Israel e o grupo Hezbollah. De acordo com Ali Hussein Nasser, tio da vítima, a jovem identificada como Mirna Raef Nasser estava no Vale do Bekaa, mesma região onde Ali Kamal Abdallah, o brasileiro de 16 anos de Foz do Iguaçu, morreu também na segunda-feira. Ela estava acompanhada do pai Raef Nasser, que é libanês, e que também morreu no ataque. Mirna mudou-se para o Líbano quando tinha 1 ano e 2 meses de idade, depois que o pai foi visitar o país e decidiu permanecer após arrumar um emprego, conta o tio da jovem. Lá, além do pai, ela morava com a mãe, dois irmãos e uma irmã. Segundo Ali Hussein Nasser, na segunda-feira a família havia deixado a casa no norte do Líbano pela manhã e voltaram pela parte da tarde para buscar roupas e materiais escolares, momento em que a casa foi atingida. “Ela falou (aos irmãos), vocês fiquem aqui, a gente vai lá e busca rápido. Na hora que eles chegaram em casa, aconteceu o ataque”, disse o tio. “Foi violento, não sobrou nada da casa. Não tem nada, nada.” Israel e o Hezbollah têm trocado tiros através da fronteira desde o início da atual guerra em Gaza no ano passado, mas Israel intensificou sua campanha militar na última semana. Nesta quinta-feira, 26, o Exército de Israel anunciou que, durante a madrugada, atacou 75 alvos do Hezbollah no sul e leste do Líbano. Na segunda-feira, ataques israelenses em larga escala no Líbano mataram 558 pessoas e feriram mais de 1.800, segundo as autoridades libanesas, o maior número em apenas um dia desde o fim da guerra civil no país (1975-1990). Segunda vítima brasileira no Líbano Essa é a segunda perda em território libanês desde a escalada entre Israel e Hezbollah na família de Ali Hussein Nasser, que é primo do brasileiro Ali Kamal Abdallah, cuja morte o Itamaraty confirmou nesta quinta-feira. “Chegou a informação do menino. Falei, eu vou ligar para meu irmão, e ele não me respondeu. Duas horas depois, veio a notícia do (falecimento) meu irmão.” Ali Kamal Abdallah morreu em explosões na segunda-feira. Natural de Foz de Iguaçu, no Paraná, o jovem estava acompanhado do pai, que é paraguaio, na região do vale do Bekaa, a cerca 30 quilômetros a leste da capital Beirute. As autoridades do governo federal afirmaram que a embaixada do Brasil em Beirute está prestando assistência aos familiares.

author: Jimmy Hascup
title: Eagles legends don’t like what they heard from Jalen Hurts: ‘I’m a little concerned’
text:
Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Jalen Hurts is not off to a promising start this season, according to two franchise legends — and it has everything to do with what he said during his 10-minute media availability Wednesday, the first day of training camp. FS1′s “Speak” held a segment discussing Hurts in new offensive coordinator’s Kellen Moore’s system and whether there were any concerns. While all five panelists shared some worry, the ones from former stars LeSean McCoy and DeSean Jackson were particularly noteworthy.
BUY EAGLES TICKETS:
STUBHUB, VIVID SEATS, TICKETMASTER
They
did not like how Hurts talked about Moore’s offense, using words like “differences” and “process” he’s going through to “make it (his) own.”
“I don’t think he should have brought it up,” McCoy said Wednesday. “Because when you a dog and you like that, I’m going to be good anywhere I play at. ... But no matter where you put me at, if I’m a really good player, I’m gonna be that good player.
“So I only have to talk about it because I’ve been watching guys like AJ Brown speak about Kellen Moore; ‘how you feel about it?’ He loves him. Devonte Smith, he loves him. ... Everyone is saying all that but then you saying ... well, so I just hate that part of the game.”
McCoy, who played for the Eagles from 2009-14, continued by clarifying that he’s a Hurts fan. The former running back thinks she’s a “really good player” and a winner. He just doesn’t want to see any excuses creep into his game.
“So look, new coordinator, find a way to win, because this is what I do know: When you pay a quarterback, not on a player, but pay a quarterback all that money, we gonna find ways to make you comfortable,” McCoy said.
Therein lies the rub for Jackson, the former receiver who played in Philadelphia from 2008-13 and then 2019-20.
“I’m a little concerned,” Jackson said. “... Kellen Moore, I know Philadelphia. You got my boy stuttering, I don’t usually hear him stutter like that. Make it condensed for him, the terminology, the plays. ... I’m a little concerned. I know one thing: the fans aren’t going to allow that. ...
“If Hurts is uncomfortable, it’s going to show. Before he got paid, he was just out there playing.”
Hurts was anointed as the face of the franchise when he signed a five-year, $255 million extension in April 2023. High expectations were magnified after his Eagles reached the Super Bowl in 2023. Instead, Hurts felt the criticism that comes with not meeting expectations — he regressed individually and contributed to the Eagles ending their season with six losses in their final seven games, including the NFC wild card.
But he’s still one of the NFL’s best quarterbacks and all he needs to do is win to change the narrative.

author: Darrell Ponder
title: Cinergy looking to redevelop former Regal Tall City in Midland | newswest9.com
text:
MIDLAND, Texas — Cinergy is set to work on plans for a redevelopment at its newest location, the former Regal Tall City at 4915 Loop 250 Frontage Road in Midland , according to a news release from Scandal Co-Active Laura McGregor.
McGregor said this new venue will be bringing "a bold new vision to life."
"This transformative project will reimagine the entire space, creating a next-generation entertainment destination that promises something for everyone," said McGregor.
Here are what McGregor said are the highlights of the renovation:
All auditoriums will be remodeled, feature upgraded seating and cutting-edge projection and sound systems for a crazy cinematic experience. "Some auditoriums will be repurposed to make room for exciting attractions. Imagine a “Dave & Buster’s on steroids,” featuring state-of-the-art escape rooms, bowling lanes, arcade games, and a dynamic restaurant and bar area." "A completely revamped exterior will dramatically enhance the location's curb appeal and set the tone for the immersive experiences inside." But now even more exciting, Cinergy is to consider expanding to bring a "pro-style premium indoor go-kart racing to Midland." These plans include "two three-level ¼-mile-long indoor tracks designed for high-speed thrills," McGregor said.
With these inclusions, these tracks will be complete with high performance karts requiring helmets, challenging fast-paced tracks and even racing simulators and a spectacular lighting system.
McGregor stated "this facility will rival top attractions like Andretti Indoor Karting and will provide the most premium karting experience between Dallas and Denver."
Cinergy is collaborating with Midland officials and the Midland Development Corporation to make this vision a reality.
"This is a big project, and we'll need significant support to bring it to life," said McGregor.
Close Ad
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing

author: (G_102514520614899943563) Артем Фунтиков
title: Власти рассказали о последствиях использования Google Meet
text:
Фото: Unsplash
Советы, каким мессенджером заменить Telegram и WhatsApp тоже были.
Вчера Роскомнадзор официально
подтвердилблокировку звонков в Telegram и WhatsApp. В связи с этим пользователи начали искать альтернативу дешевой связи. Одним из вариантов был Google Meet. Зампред комитета Госдумы по информационной политике, технологиям и связи Олег Матвейчев
предостерегроссиян от перехода в другие мессенджеры:
t.me/iguides
«В Евросоюзе официально имеют право прослушивать и записывать любого человека, для этого даже не нужно возбуждения уголовного дела. Естественно, Google все эти нормы выполняет. Я бы предостерёг россиян, которые не хотят, чтобы все их разговоры были подслушаны, обработаны, потом проданы и использованы в разных мошеннических или других противоправных действиях, пользоваться Google Meet», — ответил Матвейчев.
Сам политик признался, что перешел на отечественный мессенджер и рекомендовал гражданам России пользоваться только им.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: Rafael Batista Reis
title: Destaques do Estrela da Amadora: Gaspar liderou até chegar a derrocada | Abola.pt
text:
Capitão dos tricolores liderava a defensiva quando o adversário já forçava a reviravolta, mas a expulsão e o descontrolo emocional conduziram os amadorenses à derrocada
O minuto 71 representa um ponto de viragem para o jogo do Estrela da Amadora, servindo de fronteira para duas fases bem diferentes: até à expulsão do guarda-redes Wagner, os tricolores seguravam a igualdade, sem grande inspiração na sua frente ofensiva, mas assentes na liderança e disponibilidade de Kialonda Gaspar, que servia de pronto-socorro em quase todas as suas intervenções, bem coadjuvado por Erivaldo Almeida no trio de centrais, composto ainda pelo adaptado Shinga, que acabaria o encontro na sua posição natural de lateral esquerdo, sendo que na direita Jean Felipe trouxe agressividade ofensiva e o canto que proporcionou o golo de Gaspar. Do banco saltaram Pedro Sá, que entrou para desfazer o trio de centrais e trazer maior consistência ao meio-campo, no qual Léo Cordeiro, sempre muito batalhador, já necessitava de auxílio para os duelos com o trio de médios do Arouca, que foram ganhando vantagem com o decorrer da segunda parte, levando à substituição de Vitó. Já Edmilson teve de entrar direto à baliza para ser herói na defesa do penálti, mas a depois a não revelar o sangue-frio necessário para tranquilizar os seus companheiros, que foram perdendo o discernimento enquanto o resultado se avolumava.
As notas dos jogadores do Estrela da Amadora: Wagner (3), Kialonda Gaspar (5), Erivaldo Almeida (5), Nkanyiso Shinga (4), Jean Felipe (5), Léo Cordeiro (5), Vitó (4), João Reis (4), Léo Jabá (4), Ronald (4), André Luiz (3), Ronaldo Tavares (4), Manuel Keliano (3), Pedro Sá (4), Edmilson (3) e Kikas (2).
